Description: PLEASE NOTE: This listing is only for the U.S. Lower 48 states. This guitar has seen very little use and is in excellent condition as you can see from the photos. Neck is straight with no buzz; frets have a lifetime left. Three-way switch and controls all work as they should. As a used guitar there are a few tiny flaws. I really think they are negligible but I've pointed a couple of them out in picture 4 (a minuscule ding) and picture 6 (some very light scratches). I feel these satin finishes can be very sensitive to even minor bumps and knocks. The Seymour Duncan pickups really shine and you can get some amazing clean tones in both humbucker and tapped mode (via the push-pull volume control). It doesn't come with a case but I do have the original packaging and it will be fully insured. See the full specs below and feel free to shoot me a message if you have any questions. Insured shipping via UPS Ground to U.S. Lower 48 only. Thanks and good luck!
